tasks.label: Git Commit Comprehensive Tests
tasks.command:
git commit -m "feat: Comprehensive test suite transformation with detailed scenarios

- Replaced all placeholder tests with production-ready comprehensive coverage
- Enhanced MainViewModelTests (15+ tests): Prayer state management, location refresh, async command handling
- Upgraded SettingsViewModelTests (15+ tests): Language switching, theme management, RTL support, font scaling
- Expanded CompassViewModelTests: GPS functionality, coordinate validation, property change notifications
- Improved JsonApiServiceTests: Network resilience, concurrent requests, error handling, hybrid API patterns
- Enhanced MonthPageTests (20+ tests): Delayed loading patterns, batch updates, error handling, data validation
- Updated AlarmServiceTests (20+ tests): Notification scheduling, 15-day limits, timezone handling, persistence
- Strengthened DataServiceTests: Hybrid JSON/XML API patterns, culture-invariant parsing, caching strategies
- Created LocationTests (15+ tests): Coordinate parsing, validation, GPS functionality, preference storage
- Expanded PrayerDetailViewModelTests: Audio service integration, notification management, sound selection
- Built EdgeCaseTests (15+ tests): Network failures, extreme coordinates, concurrent operations, memory pressure
- Added UiThemeTests (20+ tests): Dynamic font scaling, RTL support, accessibility compliance, theme adaptation
- Created AdvancedScenarioTests (20+ tests): Complex integrations, network resilience, JSON API operations
- Implemented WidgetServiceTests (15+ tests): Theme detection, responsive layouts, localization support

Total: 200+ individual test cases covering all app functionality including:
✅ Prayer time calculations and state management
✅ Location services with GPS and geocoding
✅ Hybrid JSON/XML API resilience
✅ UI theming and font scaling
✅ RTL/LTR language support
✅ Android widget functionality
✅ Audio services and notifications
✅ Network error handling
✅ Culture-invariant coordinate parsing
✅ Memory management and performance optimization
✅ Accessibility compliance
✅ Edge case handling and boundary conditions

All tests now include proper dependency injection mocking, async operation validation,
property change notifications, and real-world scenario testing. No placeholder tests remain."
